Townsfolk.name: Washerwoman
Townsfolk.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.

Townsfolk.name: Librarian
Townsfolk.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

Townsfolk.name: Investigator
Townsfolk.description: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.

Townsfolk.name: Chef
Townsfolk.description: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.

Townsfolk.name: Empath
Townsfolk.description: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.

Townsfolk.name: Fortune Teller
Townsfolk.description: Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.

Townsfolk.name: Undertaker
Townsfolk.description: Each night (Not the First Night), you learn which character died by execution today.

Townsfolk.name: Monk
Townsfolk.description: Each night (Not the First Night), choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.

Townsfolk.name: Ravenkeeper
Townsfolk.description: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.

Townsfolk.name: Virgin
Townsfolk.description: The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.

Townsfolk.name: Slayer
Townsfolk.description: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.

Townsfolk.name: Soldier
Townsfolk.description: You are safe from the Demon.

Townsfolk.name: Mayor
Townsfolk.description: If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.

Outsiders.name: Butler
Outsiders.description: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.

Outsiders.name: Drunk
Outsiders.description: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.

Outsiders.name: Recluse
Outsiders.description: You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.

Outsiders.name: Saint
Outsiders.description: If you die by execution, your team loses.

Minions.name: Poisoner
Minions.description: Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.

Minions.name: Spy
Minions.description: Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.

Minions.name: Baron
Minions.description: There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]

Minions.name: Scarlet Woman
Minions.description: If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don't count.)

Demons.name: Imp
Demons.description: Each night (Not the First Night), choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.
